title: Kwasi Kwarteng – 2022 Statement Scrapping Tax Cut for High Earners
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Kwasi Kwarteng, the Chancellor of the Exchequer, on 3 October 2022.
content:
From supporting British business to lowering the tax burden for the lowest paid, our Growth Plan sets out a new approach to build a more prosperous economy.
